description: contains 12 pieces High quality gardening tools. Gardening pruners blades are made of high carbon sk-5 Steel. Compare with aluminum Made blades, It is more toughness, sharp and durable.
Scuddles garden tools help you clear dirt and debris from plants without doing damage to the bases of the plants. You can also use them to help you plant seeds.

The NEIKO gardening kit consists of a heavy duty set that offers planting tools that are constructed of high-grade polished aluminum that resists rust for the toughest gardening jobs in your home garden.
